title: Dairy and egg free bread and butter pudding
ingredients: ['50g sunflower spread (e.g. Vitalite/Pure)', '5 tablespoons apricot jam', '1 large french baguette or baton', '60g sultanas and/or dried cranberries', '80 to 120g Orgran no egg or similar egg substitute', '1 tablespoon olive oil or sunflower oil', '40g caster sugar', '300ml AlproÂ® soya cream', '300ml unsweetened soya milk', '1 to 2 tablespoons demerara sugar, to sprinkle', 'Swedish glace vanilla ice cream (made with soya) or Alpro soya cream']
